header.searchPlaceholder: Search references by source or classification...

uploader.howItWorksDescription: This tool extracts key frames from your videos and uses AI to automatically classify them by composition, action, lighting, and more. This helps you quickly build a searchable reference library for your creative projects.

apiKeySetup.title: Enter your Gemini API Key to get started.
apiKeySetup.getApiKey: You can get a free API key from
apiKeySetup.storageInfo: Your API key is stored securely in your browser and is never sent anywhere else.
